title: Amazing Experience
text:
When we decided to visit Maramures, we were looking for a place just like this one. A traditional wooden house. I really recommend choosing an accommodation like this one when visiting Maramures, rather than a modern hotel. It's part of the experience.
Our host was amazing and the best part was the food. Really recommend choosing to eat at "La Gorgan".
The rooms were clean, warm and traditionally decorated.
We will definitely return.

title: Amazing Experience
text:
I really enjoyed the first experience that i had with MAT. This restaurant was recommended to us by a friend.
The tacos were amazing. A bit pricy but amazing and the staff was very friendly.
I really recommend this place

title: One of the best burgers
text: I love them. I have found Coffee shop and Burger when i moved nearby. Since then, i have eaten there and ordered especially, a lot. The Burgers are amazing. I really recommend going there. I have even sent there so many friends. They also had an amazing experience.

title: Amazing Experience
text:
I really enjoy coming here. The garden is so beautiful and quiet. It's the perfect place for a good breakfast, or a nice dinner with some friends.
Me and my husband even organized a small event here. It was amazing.

title: A nice place to have a delicious breakfast
text: We searched a lot for a place to have breakfast when we were in Sibiu. After a while we found this nice place that opens early. The food was delicious. We will definitely return

title: Best burger ever !!!
text:
Best burger ever. I was amazed by how good was the food.
The stuff was very friendly and the food arrived in no time.

title: Amazing food, Amazing location
text: We went there because it was close to us, to the beach we went that day. It was our first time there and we were amazed. The place is so peaceful and quiet. The food was absolutely delicious and the stuff was friendly. We already recommended the place to some of our friends and we will definitely return.

title: Good food but bad service
text:
We went today for the first time at Tasaul. The place was recommended to us by a friend. We arrived at 14:00 ordered a starter and A main course. We were starving. The starter arrived in 40 minutes. It was good, but very small. After that we waited and waited for the main course. The food arrived at 16:00. They apologized by saying it is Sunday and the place in crowded but in the time that we sat and waited for the food, lots of people arrived, were served and were leaving, having same dishes as we did. We were a small table (only 2 people) and didnâ€™t order a lot.
The food was good but not marvelous.

title: Amazing Experience
text:
We went there in January. The weather was perfect. Not to hot, not to cold, but sunny.
There were not so many people, not so crowded.
You have to walk a little to get to the top but it's pleasant.
The view from there it's absolutely stunning.

I love that they are restoring it.

title: Great place, Great food
text:
The place is near the city center, near Acropolis, is great for lunch and dinner.
We had sea food and it was delicious.
The servings was great and fast.

title: Nice location but that's just about it.
text:
The idea is nice. The location in great. Right in the city center.
The service was just ok (we ordered grill chicken and they bought us fried chicken), the food, again, ok. Not amazing but good related to the prices.
Although, the chairs where incredibly dirty. At first i didn't want to sit there but i was really hungry and looking for a place to eat right away.
Everything is very poorly maintained

title: Great place, Awesome coffee !
text:
A very cozy place in an awesome location. The coffee (specialty coffee) is excellent, the music is great.
Perfect for a quiet and relaxing afternoon.

title: Great Atmosphere! Great Food
text: A variety of food and pleasant atmosphere. Very good for a summer evening or afternoon. The food is delicious but they don't have a large variety of drinks

title: Amazing food but unprepared staff
text:
The atmosphere was great, the food was delicious, but the stuff was terrible. I called in advance because i wanted a place on the terrace and wanted to make a reservation. They told me that it's no need for a reservation on the terrace and that i should make a reservation if i want a table inside. When we got there, the restaurant was empty and the terrace was full, so i did caught a place upstairs, on the terrace.
Also on that day, their grill wasn't working so they couldn't make any dish from the menu that is prepared on grill, and that means like 50% of the them.
And i also spotted the bartender stirring the ingredients from my Mojito with his own finger

title: Amazing Culinary Experience
text: It was an amazing experience. I personally enjoy French cuisine and this is my favorite French restaurant from Romania. I gladly command it. The staff was great and kind

title: Amazing Experience !!!
text: It was am amazing and fun experience in which i had the chance to learn about Guinness Beer, how it s made and it's legacy. I also had the chance to taste Guinness Beer directly from the factory. And it surely taste better than the one form the town.

title: Very cozy but far from the city center
text: The rooms were comfortable but unequipped. For example you do not have a fridge or a hair dryer. Our view was a bit terrible and the hotel is very far from the city center, like 45 minutes by tram. It is good that is located near the tram station. There are no restaurants near by, just a mc Donalds, a cafe ( where they have very nice food especially for breakfast) and a gas station. The staff was nice and friendly.

title: Amazing place, amazing view !
text: The place looks like it is taken from a fairy tale. You can spot an amazing view over the City of Angels. It is very close to the Hollywood sign. The projected shows are amazing. There is also a little restaurant there but more like a canteen

title: Amazing experience
text:
If you visit Dublin, this museum should be on your " To do list".
Our guide, Ronan, gave us am amazing tour of the the history of Dublin and Ireland.
